title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum


1 point: Aeneas is fated to marry Lavinia. (Lavinia does not have to be identified by name, but the student must refer specifically to relevant events in Books 7-12.)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point maximum


1 point: Aeneas is fated to marry Lavinia. (Lavinia does not have to be identified by name, but the student must refer specifically to relevant events in Books 7-12.)

Student response earns one of the available points.
